text: Nenapisikoḷḷiri; avanu (allāhanu)ād janāṅgada baḷika nim'mannu uttarādhikārigaḷāgi māḍidanu hāgū avanu nimage bhūmiyalli neleyannu odagisidanu. Nīvīga adara bayalu pradēśagaḷalli aramanegaḷannu nirmisuttīri mattu beṭṭagaḷannu koredu nivāsagaḷannu racisuttīri. Allāhana koḍuge gaḷannu smarisiri mattu bhūmiyalli aśāntiyannu habbuvavarāgi aleyabēḍi
